name: New World Order
description: The New World Order coin is a deflationary token built on Binance Smartchain, also referred to as the ‘Elite Coin’ among the community. The New World Order coin is set to be the totalisation of Financial Systems. NEWOs will be a store of value, a medium of transaction, and a hedge against inflation.This coin is one of the most exclusive coins due the massive coin burn happened at the first community event - where 693,000,000,000 Coins(99%) were burnt into 0x2dead865020a247965187f2334de15a1dd03bfe8 NEWO road map will signify 100% automation, totalisation and decentralisation when they achieve their final Target of being Listed at the Binance Exchange. Once the final objective is achieved the developers and marketing team will sign off and the token will be 100% Decentralised and community driven.
